: 2:
You are my husband. In return for the love I have for you, I intend to transfer to you some immovable property in the village of Kulla, namely the property as per the schedule, which is my ancestral property. I hereby grant you the vacant land listed in the Schedule below, which I have been enjoying with full right of possession and enjoyment till date, free of charge. 
Furthermore, from now on, you shall be the full owner of the property listed in the Schedule and shall enjoy it freely and freely with all the rights of sale and donation. 
Whatever disputes may arise in this regard, whether by mutual consent or by others, at any time or by whomsoever, I shall settle all such disputes at my own expense and I and my fellow citizens shall be responsible to you and your residents and shall be able to implement this settlement document without any delay. 
The property listed in the Schedule shall not be transferred to anyone else. I hereby declare and assure you that the property is undisputed and unalienable without any written or verbal agreements, such as purchases, purchase agreements, mortgages, guarantees, donations, etc. This settlement deed is written and given in your name. This property is not subject to Andhra Pradesh Act No. 9/77. I have written and given this settlement deed in your name knowingly, voluntarily and with good will. Since the property is a residential property as per the schedule, no notices have been filed. -: Market Value Statement :- Village Name Survey No. Limit per sq.m. Market Value 100/5 sq.m. If any of the information provided herein is untrue, the clerk who prepared this document, the registration department and the staff of the registration office will not be held responsible for them and we will be liable for all legal actions taken against us. We hereby declare that we have submitted our title deeds, E.C., Aadhar card, passport card, photo of the immovable property etc. to the undersigned for the preparation of this document. According to them, the undersigned has examined the schedule property in this document and the undersigned has prepared and issued this document as requested by us and the undersigned. sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 359 of 2026, dated 29/Jan/2026, executed by Telu Venkatalakshmi, in favour of her Husband, Telu Durga Prasad, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 90 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 3-167/8 Dismantled, Block No. 3, Assessment No. 199513001057, comprised in survey number 100/5, situated in Koolla Village and Gramapanchayat, K. Gangavaram Mandal, within the District of Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Konassema, registered at sub-registrar office Draksharama is bounded as follows: North by: 36'-0" Ft. Property of Akumudi Dhanalakshmi South by: 36'-0" Ft. Property of others East by: 22'-6" Ft. Land of Suraya West by: 22'-6" Ft. Road
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible
